Package lac.algorithms.cpar

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Classifier
    Given a rule set containing rules for each class, CPAR uses the best k rules of each class for prediction, with the following procedure: (1) select all the rules whose bodies are satisfied by the example; (2) from the rules selected in step (1), select the best k rules for each class; and (3) compare the average expected accuracy of the best k rules of each class and choose the class with the highest expected accuracy as the predicted class.
    Config
    Configuration used to generate the classifier.
    CPAR
    Main class for the algorithm CPAR.
    PRM
    Class used for obtaining class association rules.
    Rule
    Class used to represent a Rule in the CPAR algorithm.
